IncidentDef.label: ship part crash (fungoid)
IncidentDef.letterText:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists have heard the stories of the dawn of space exploration and all the ancient vessels that went missing in outer space. Judging by the markings, it must be one of those vessels. They can hear scratching and growling emanating from the inside.

Destroy it as soon as possible. But beware - something may emerge when you open fire at the ship.
